trans-unit.source: This section contains information and guidance about the brokered messaging pattern supported by <token>sb1</token>.
trans-unit.target: This section contains information and guidance about the brokered messaging pattern supported by <token>sb1</token>.

trans-unit.source: Contains two tutorials that use the <token>sb2</token> brokered messaging pattern.
trans-unit.target: Contains two tutorials that use the <token>sb2</token> brokered messaging pattern.

trans-unit.source: The tutorials cover both the managed API (.NET) and REST programming models.
trans-unit.target: The tutorials cover both the managed API (.NET) and REST programming models.

trans-unit.source: Describes how to create a simple application that uses <token>sb2</token> queues.
trans-unit.target: Describes how to create a simple application that uses <token>sb2</token> queues.

trans-unit.source: An introduction to using <token>sb2</token> topics and subscriptions.
trans-unit.target: An introduction to using <token>sb2</token> topics and subscriptions.

trans-unit.source: Azure Queues and Service Bus Queues - Compared and Contrasted
trans-unit.target: Azure Queues and Service Bus Queues - Compared and Contrasted

trans-unit.source: A detailed comparison of both queueing technologies.
trans-unit.target: A detailed comparison of both queueing technologies.

trans-unit.source: Describes the options to partition queues or topics across multiple message brokers and messaging stores
trans-unit.target: Describes the options to partition queues or topics across multiple message brokers and messaging stores

trans-unit.source: Describes the Auto-forwarding feature that enables you to chain a subscription or queue to another queue or topic.
trans-unit.target: Describes the Auto-forwarding feature that enables you to chain a subscription or queue to another queue or topic.

trans-unit.source: Describes how to use <token>sb2</token> to optimize performance when exchanging brokered messages.
trans-unit.target: Describes how to use <token>sb2</token> to optimize performance when exchanging brokered messages.

trans-unit.source: Describes techniques you can use to protect applications against a potential <token>sb2</token> datacenter outage.
trans-unit.target: Describes techniques you can use to protect applications against a potential <token>sb2</token> datacenter outage.

trans-unit.source: Describes how to use asynchronous messaging capabilities.
trans-unit.target: Describes how to use asynchronous messaging capabilities.

trans-unit.source: Describes support for the Advanced Message Queuing Protocol (AMQP) 1.0 in <token>sb2</token>.
trans-unit.target: Describes support for the Advanced Message Queuing Protocol (AMQP) 1.0 in <token>sb2</token>.

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use the Defer method when processing messages.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use the Defer method when processing messages.

trans-unit.source: Describes how to integrate a WCF workflow service with <token>sb2</token> queues and topics.
trans-unit.target: Describes how to integrate a WCF workflow service with <token>sb2</token> queues and topics.
